RSA FERNET: LEAPS: ENZYME_CREATOR: # # THIS CREATES THREE ENZYMES # # THE FERNET ENZYME IS A COLD ENZYME # from movies_ogv.RSA_FERNET.ENZYME_CREATOR import ENZYME_CREATOR from movies_ogv.RSA_FERNET.STORE import STORE OUTPUTS = ENZYME_CREATOR ( RSA_SIZE = 2048, WRITE_OUTPUTS = True, OUTPUTS = { "RSA_HOT_ENZYME": "", "RSA_COLD_ENZYME": "", "FERNET_ENZYME": " "" } ); FILE: HEAT: COLD: FOLDER: HEAT: COLD: SUMMARY: DATA IS ENCRYPTED WITH FERNET FERNET KEY IS ENCRYPTED WITH RSA PRIVATE KEY SEQUENCE: HEAT COOL CHECK EQUALITY OF FOLDERS
